function.name: get_current_weather
function.description: Get the current weather for a city.
function.long_description: Retrieves real-time weather conditions such as temperature, humidity, wind speed, and weather description for a specified city using an external weather API.

city.description: Name of the city to get current weather information for

example_user_queries: What is the weather in London right now?
Get current weather for New York
How is the weather today in Chennai?
Show me the weather in Paris
What’s the temperature in Berlin now?
Tell me today’s weather in Mumbai
What is the weather like in San Francisco?
